info.commstep: In each communication step k, process i sends to rank (i + 2k) all the data blocks whose kth bit is 1, receives data from rank (i âˆ’ 2k), and stores the incoming data into blocks whose kth bit is 1 (that is, overwriting the data that was just sent).
In each communication step k, process p sends to (rank + k) % P, where P is the total number of processes. The algorithm takes P - 1 communication steps.
